::Feline::

She fell to the ground.  The internal explosion blew her apart.  Her 
lower body blown off and laying in fragments of metal on the ground 
near her. Her torso was hollowed out and her face was burnt.  Her 
left arm was blown off, but her right arm was still attached.  She 
lay there, gasping for breath.  Her optics already black,  her spark 
in it's finally beats.
She whispered,"Hotrod....HotRod..I...I.." her spark 
flutters,"I...loved...you...for...give....me."  a single tear ran 
down her cheek as the finall breath escaped past her 
lips.  "HotRooooddd."  Her spark went to join the matrix.
Her once beautiful body now lay in charred pieces on the ground.


(Please put Feline on the deceased list.)
